# automaticallyUpdatesContentConfiguration

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the view automatically updates its content configuration when its state changes.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var automaticallyUpdatesContentConfiguration: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When this value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the cell automatically calls [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIContentConfiguration-9eib5/updated(for:)] on its [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableViewHeaderFooterView/contentConfiguration-6b4eg] when the view’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableViewHeaderFooterView/configurationState-7xj7r] changes, and applies the updated configuration back to the view. The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

If you override [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableViewHeaderFooterView/updateConfiguration(using:)] to manually update and customize the content configuration, disable automatic updates by setting this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Managing the content

- **defaultContentConfiguration()**: Retrieves a default list content configuration for the view’s style.
- **contentConfiguration**: The current content configuration of the view.
- **contentView**: The content view of the header or footer.
